org.apache.logging.log4j.audit

Class LogEventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.audit.LogEventFactory

  • public class LogEventFactory
extends Object
    Handles logging generated Events. Every Event extends the AuditProxy, which handles construction of the Event and logging of the Event.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LogEventFactory()

      Used to Log the actual AuditMessage.
      static void logEvent(Class<?> intrface, Map<String,String> properties)
      This method is used to construct and AuditMessage from a set of properties and the Event interface that represents the event being audited using the default error handler.

      This method is used to construct and AuditMessage from a set of properties and the Event interface that represents the event being audited.

      • getEvent

        public static <T extends AuditEvent> T getEvent(Class<T> intrface)
        Constructs an Event object from its interface.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The Event type.
        Parameters:
        intrface - The Event interface.
        Returns:
        Returns an instance of the Event.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(Class<?> intrface,
                            Map<String,String> properties)
        This method is used to construct and AuditMessage from a set of properties and the Event interface that represents the event being audited using the default error handler.
        Parameters:
        intrface - The Event interface.
        properties - The properties to be included in the event.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(Class<?> intrface,
                            Map<String,String> properties,
                            AuditExceptionHandler handler)
        This method is used to construct and AuditMessage from a set of properties and the Event interface that represents the event being audited.
        Parameters:
        intrface - The Event interface.
        properties - The properties to be included in the event.
        handler - Class that gets control when an exception occurs logging the event.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(AuditMessage msg,
                            AuditExceptionHandler handler)
        Used to Log the actual AuditMessage.
        Parameters:
        msg - The AuditMessage.
        handler - Class that gets control when an exception occurs logging the event.
